explanation: [0-0] In a bright kitchen, a young man in a pink tie-dye T-shirt stands by a kitchen counter holding a bottle of ketchup. A plate of french fries sits on the white-tiled countertop in front of him. The white text "When you don't shake the ketchup:" is written across the top of the frame.
[0-2] He then opens the ketchup bottle, rests one hand on the table, and starts squeezing ketchup onto the fries with the other hand.
